bug.author: azhavoro
bug.summary: Auto annotation fails for tasks which have several jobs with overlap > 0
bug.description: If a task has several jobs and overlap parameter > 0 run of auto annotation will fail with error message like this: <denchmark-code>django.db.utils.IntegrityError: duplicate key value violates unique constraint "engine_labeledshape_pkey" DETAIL: Key (id)=(13663) already exists. </denchmark-code>
